titles.title: State Retirement Savings Act of 2016
A bill to authorize State-sponsored multiple employer plans and State payroll deduction savings programs.
State Retirement Savings Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
State Retirement Savings Act of 2016
This bill amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to authorize and establish requirements for: (1) state-sponsored multiple employer retirement plans, and (2) state-managed payroll deduction savings programs that provide individual retirement plans.
